text: Khoo Chin-bee (born 4 May 1977 in Perak) is a former Malaysian female tennis player. Khoo has won one singles and nine doubles titles on the ITF circuit in her career. On 15 September 2003, she reached her best singles ranking of world number 329. On 17 August 1998, she peaked at world number 209 in the doubles rankings. Playing for Malaysia at the Fed Cup, Khoo has a win-loss record of 25-17. Khoo retired from tennis 2009. ==ITF Circuit finals== $100,000 tournaments $75,000 tournaments $50,000 tournaments $25,000 tournaments $10,000 tournaments ===Singles finals: 6 (1–5)=== Result No Date
